title: From full-on racing to top North American talent: Four reasons to watch GPs de Québec and Montréal
content:
The two one-day races will feature a star-studded start list, including some major North American talent.

Read the full article at From full-on racing to top North American talent: Four reasons to watch GPs de Québec and Montréal on Velo.
